meta.name: Name That Tune
meta.description: Created by Harry Salter, the one-hour game show tests contestants' music knowledge, as they battle it out in an assortment of challenging musical games for cash and prizes.

videos.title: Just Another Day at the Office
videos.overview: Actress Torrey Devitto goes head-to-head with actor Craig Robinson; a legal consultant competes with a bartender.

videos.title: Hair Raising Tunes
videos.overview: A hair stylist competes with an occupational therapist; a hair stylist competes with a theater artist.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Contestants battle for the prize in this series premiere episode.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Four new contestants are welcomed to the stage, where their musical abilities are put to the test.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test in the first part of a two-hour episode.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test in the second part of a two-hour episode.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test in the first part of the two-hour season finale.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test in the second part of a two-hour season finale.

videos.title: TV Royalty and Gridiron Champs
videos.overview: The season premiere episode features TV personality/actress/singer Kelly Osbourne, playing for the Sharon Osbourne Colon Cancer Program at Cedars-Sinai vs. singer/songwriter/actress JoJo, playing for The Hole in the Wall Gang; and former NFL star/Super Bowl champ/actor Vernon Davis, playing for the Vernon Davis Foundation vs. former NFL star/Super Bowl champ Victor Cruz, playing for the Victor Cruz Foundation.

videos.title: Sitcom Stars and Olympic Legends
videos.overview: Actress and television personality Jodie Sweetin ("Fuller House") plays for The Scleroderma Research Foundation vs. actor Frankie Muniz ("Malcolm in the Middle"), playing for the State Forty Eight Foundation; and gold medal-winning Olympic gymnast Laurie Hernandez plays both for the Alzheimer's Association and OneMind.org vs. five-time Olympic Medalist Nastia Liukin, playing for the Special Olympics.

videos.title: The Good, The Shag, and the 90210 Icons
videos.overview: Former "Beverly Hills 90210" sweethearts "Kelly" and "Steve" go note-to-note: Actress Jennie Garth, playing for the Equus Foundation vs. Actor Ian Ziering, playing for The Epidermolysis Bullosa Medical Research Foundation; and Grammy Award-winning artist Shaggy, playing for the Shaggy Make a Difference Foundation vs. Actress/Director Kim Fields ("The Upshaws"), playing for Back On My Feet.

videos.title: Country Divas and Spicy Stars of the Stage
videos.overview: Singer/songwriter Cassadee Pope, playing for Creative Waves Foundation vs. singer/actress Jana Kramer, playing for Safe Horizon; and actor/singer Tituss Burgess ("Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt"), playing for Broadway Dreams vs. Spice Girl and singer/actress Mel B., playing for Women's Aid.

videos.title: It's a Party Tonight
videos.overview: Four new contestants are put to the test.

videos.title: Love is in the Air
videos.overview: This week's episode focuses on the universal theme of LOVE, as contestant Khalia, on the brink of engagement and from Tampa, FL, competes against newly engaged Ian from Los Angeles, CA; and then, Mark from New York, NY, competes against Christina from Las Vegas, NV, in a series of love-focused songs for the chance to win cash and potentially the $100,000 grand prize.

videos.title: Rock the Night Away
videos.overview: This week's episode celebrates rock and roll as contestant Janice from Garland, TX, competes against Tim from Taunton, MA, and then, Vince from Cleveland, OH, competes against Daniel from Sherman Oaks, CA, in a series of rock and roll tunes for the chance to win cash and potentially the $100,000 grand prize.

videos.title: Tune Goes 80's and 90's
videos.overview: This week's episode is a blast from the past, as contestant Isaac from Los Angeles, CA, and Alexandra from Bronx, NY, guess tunes straight from the 1980s; and then, Brenton from Portland, OR, competes against Roisin from Fanwood, NJ, as they try to name a series of songs from the '90s for the chance to win cash and potentially the $100,000 grand prize.

videos.title: Movie Night
videos.overview: It's movie night, as teacher Lori from Austin, TX, goes head-to-head with Dave from New York, who works in advertising. Round One is "Mixtape," and all the tunes are from the movies. The theme continues into the Bid-A-Note round, which concludes in a blockbuster ending. The Hollywood theme keeps coming as Chris, a legal assistant from Brooklyn, NY, takes on Kalisha from Minneapolis, MN, who works in digital marketing. Will either of them win the $100k grand prize?

videos.title: Superfan and the Mompreneur
videos.overview: The second hour features Sara, an executive assistant from Bronx, NY, who takes on Tye, a military veteran from Atlanta, GA. Sara shows her "New York mean," but will she beat the military vet for the big money in the Golden Medley? Next, Raymond, an accountant from Chicago, faces New Orleans entrepreneur and mom Lyndsey. Round One starts with a NAME THAT TUNE favorite, "Spin Me Round." The prizes stack up, and there's even an underwater scooter on offer! See who will sink and who will swim, as competitors slug it out to come out on top and win the $100,000 grand prize.

videos.title: The Main Event for Big Gold
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Chris Jericho, Adam Rippon, Todrick Hall and Sheryl Swoopes.

videos.title: Name That TV Star
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Craig Ferguson, Jack McBrayer, Tisha Campbell and Elizabeth Berkley Lauren.

videos.title: Jock Jammin'
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Tyron Woodley, Tiki Barber, Johnny Weir and Tara Lipinski.

videos.title: Fox Legends: Gleeful Idols
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Jordin Sparks, Clay Aiken, Amber Riley and Chris Colfer.

videos.title: Bring The Funny
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Andy Richter, Holly Robinson Peete, Michael Ian Black and Melissa Peterman.

videos.title: Spice Up the Tunes
videos.overview: The player with the most money at the end of bid-a-note moves on to the golden medley round.

videos.title: Sport Star Showdown
videos.overview: Sports stars John Salley, Adam Rippon, Rashad Jennings and Todd Gurley compete for their charities.

videos.title: Girls Just Want To Have Fun
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Megan Hilty, Rumer Willis, Belinda Carlisle and Debbie Gibson.

videos.title: Jackass Jukebox
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Taylor Hanson, JoJo Siwa, Steve-O and Rachael Harris.

videos.title: Lightning & Glitter!
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Amanda Seales, Kate Flannery, Ross Matthews and Jessie James Decker.

videos.title: Look Who's Roasted Now!
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Tig Notaro, Nicole Sullivan, Jeff Ross and Michael Kosta.

videos.title: Tunes and the City
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Kat Graham, Deon Cole, Mario Cantone and Mary Fitzgerald Bonnet.

videos.title: Love Is In The Tunes
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Kym Whitley, Caroline Rhea, Jamie Chung and Bryan Greenberg.

videos.title: Sporting Harmony
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Shawn Johnson East, Mykayla Skinner, Loni Love and Ally Brooke.

videos.title: TV Stars & Chart Toppers
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Lisa Loeb, Jesse McCartney, Corbin Bleu and Craig Ferguson.

videos.title: Absolutely Floored!
videos.overview: Two players face off against each other, racing against the clock to test their knowledge of songs.

videos.title: Comedy Classics & Real Housewives
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Heather McDonald, Kevin Nealon, Teddi Mellencamp and Cynthia Bailey.

videos.title: Next Level Showdown
videos.overview: Celebrity Chef and TV Personality Richard Blais, playing for the Berry Good Food Foundation vs. Celebrity Chef and TV Personality Nyesha Arrington, playing for Alex's Lemonade Stand and Comedian/TV Host/Actress Samantha Bee, playing for the International Rescue Committee vs. Actor/Comedian Chris Parnell playing for the Southern Poverty Law Center.

videos.title: Real Housewives Bake American Pie
videos.overview: Singer and TV Personality Erika Jayne, playing for GLAAD vs. Professional Chef and Food Network Personality Sunny Anderson, playing for Crohn's and Colitis Foundation of America and Actor and Producer Robbie Amell vs. Actor Italia Ricci, both playing for Stand Up To Cancer.

videos.title: Divas vs. Boybands
videos.overview: Actor/Writer/Comedian Wendi McLendon-Covey, playing for Foster Nation vs. Actor/Singer/Broadway Star Vanessa Williams, playing for The Vanessa Williams Endowed Scholarship Fund and Singer/Songwriter/Actor Howie Dorough, playing for Lupus LA vs. Singer/Actor Drew Lachey, playing for Lachey Arts.

videos.title: It's Destiny!
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Vivica A. Fox, Ravi Patel, Michelle Williams and Rachael Leigh Cook.

videos.title: Pharaohs and Idols
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Jay Pharoah, Nicole Byer, Teresa Giudice and David Archuleta.

videos.title: Eyes on the Prize
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Karamo Brown and Kaitlyn Bristowe.

videos.title: Bedazzled Boots & Frenemies
videos.overview: Four new contestants compete.

videos.title: Clinical Finish
videos.overview: Four new contestants compete.

videos.title: Request to Spin Me Round
videos.overview: A salesman, a hospital manager, an event coordinator and an operations manager compete.

videos.title: Barking, Brews, & Big Money
videos.overview: Katie, a dog groomer from Philadelphia, PA and Ramsha, a barista from Seattle, WA go head-to-head in game one. In game two Julie, an HR manager from Nashville, TN is up against Ben, a graduate student from Baltimore, MD.

videos.title: One Hit Wonders & Bid A Note Blunders
videos.overview: Michael, a social worker from Chicago, IL, and Bethany, a sign language interpreter from Omaha, NE face off in game one. In game two George, a hotel bartender from Los Angeles, CA plays against Ade, who works in marketing from Detroit, MI.

videos.title: Texas Hold Em!
videos.overview: April, a social worker from Dallas, TX, and Nate, a sales executive from Rochester, NY face off in game one. In game two Adam, a healthcare consultant from Chicago, IL plays against Brooke, a sports marketer from Fort Worth, TX.

videos.title: Apple for the Teacher
videos.overview: Brigid, a middle school teacher from Charlotte, NC, and Jason, a flight attendant from Houston, TX face off in game one. In game two Amore, a barista from Memphis, TN plays against Calvin, an English Teacher from Charlotte, NC.

videos.title: In the Mix
videos.overview: Brett, an e-commerce manager from Sioux Falls, SD and Dani, a bartender from Omaha, NE go head-to-head in game one. In game two Andrew, an operations analyst from Austin, TX is up against Karla, a teacher from Chicago, IL.

videos.title: No Collaborating Here
videos.overview: Mela, a stay-at-home mom from Avondale, AZ and Zach, a Veterinary Assistant from Nashville, TN go head-to-head in game one. In game two Gavriella, a digital marketing strategist from Potomac, MD is up against Marcus, a physician from Ann Arbor, MI.

videos.title: Hoop Dreams
videos.overview: Dan, a Sales Consultant from Columbus, OH, and Erin, a University Professor from Phoenix, AZ go head-to-head in game one. In game two Tiffani, a former Professional Basketball Player from Charlotte, NC is up against Christianne an Optometrist from Dayton, OH.

videos.title: Season Finale
videos.overview: Ethan, a software engineer from Chicago, IL, and Erika, a digital strategist from Los Angeles, CA go head-to-head in game one. In game two Sasha, a realtor from Albuquerque, NM is up against Sharmayne, a small business owner from Alameda, CA.

videos.title: Modern Family Tunes
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Ariel Winter face off in game one; a university program director and a retired assembly worker compete in game two.

videos.title: Real Housewives & Hilarity
videos.overview: Reality TV star Lisa Rinna and comic Matteo Lane go head-to-head; Stephanie, a graphic designer from New York, faces off against Tim, a property manager from Florida.

videos.title: A Hollywood Battle Royale
videos.overview: Aisha Tyler and Mira Sorvino face off in game one; in game two, Shakayla, a community outreach manager from North Carolina plays against Desiree, a personal development and brand coach from Florida.

videos.title: Hip-Hop Hooray!
videos.overview: Rapper Lil Jon and actor Chord Overstreet compete in Game 1; a hospital administrator and a fitness instructor compete in Game 2.

videos.title: The Medical & The Musical
videos.overview: Celebrities Omar Epps and Kal Penn face off; a project manager plays against an operations manager.

videos.title: Battle of the TV Hosts
videos.overview: Chris Harrison faces off against Adrienne Bailon-Houghton; a project manager takes on a chiropractor.

videos.title: My Big Fat Musical Showdown
videos.overview: Actresses Emily Osment and Nia Vardalos face off; Alejandro, who works in a rehearsal studio space in New York City, plays against Elsabet, a teacher in Orlando, Florida.

videos.title: Fitness vs. Funny
videos.overview: Fitness icon, Jillian Michaels, battles it out with actor and comedian, Ron Funches; a yoga instructor from Seattle competes against a nursing student from Detroit.

videos.title: Reality Realness
videos.overview: TV personality Sonja Morgan and fashion icon Christian Siriano face off; an entrepreneur plays against a salesperson.

videos.title: TV Stars on Shuffle
videos.overview: Debi Mazar faces off against Reggie Watts; an engineer faces off against a mom of five.

videos.title: Punchlines & Playlists
videos.overview: Rob Riggle and Finesse Mitchell face off; a grocery store manager plays against an accountant.

videos.title: Just Another Day at the Office
videos.overview: Actress Torrey Devitto goes head-to-head with actor Craig Robinson; a legal consultant competes with a bartender.
